articles.description: Newark's new, 33-gate Terminal A is a massive improvement compared to the antiquated facility that it replaces. Four airlines are already callling it home.
articles.content:
Hours-long delays, a power outage and a security breach werent what passengers were expecting from the brand-new Terminal A at Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR) on Thursday, Jan. 12.
After … [+9879 chars]
